focus group.translation[0].definitions[0: a small group of people that a company, political party etc asks questions in order to find out what they think of their products, actions etc
focus group.translation[1].definitions[0: a group of consumers brought together by a company to help it do MARKET RESEARCH. The consumers are asked to discuss their feelings and opinions about products, advertisements, companies etc
Consumers in focus groups told us they felt way too pressured in carpet stores.
